text: Abdul Bagui Butu Rasul (1865 - February 22, 1937, Jolo, Sulu), better known as Hadji Butu, was a Filipino statesman, politician and senator during the 4th, 6th, 7th, and 8th Philippine Legislatures representing the 12th senatorial district. == References == Category:1865 births Category:1937 deaths Category:Politicians from Sulu Category:Senators of the 4th Philippine Legislature Category:Senators of the 6th Philippine Legislature Category:Senators of the 7th Philippine Legislature Category:Senators of the 8th Philippine Legislature
title: Hadji Butu
